snippet: A bloop single gave Baltimore its 13th straight victory in extra-inning games and put an end to a run of 14 consecutive losing seasons.
abstract: Baltimore Orioles defeat Tampa Bay Rays, 3-2, in 14 innings.
lead_paragraph: A bloop single gave Baltimore its 13th straight victory in extra-inning games and put an end to a run of 14 consecutive losing seasons.

headline.seo: Orioles Sweep Rays and Keep Pressure on Yankees
headline.main: Orioles Keep Showing Flair for the Dramatic
headline.print_headline: Orioles Keep Showing Flair for the Dramatic
